boxes.title: The Last Word Hand Cannon
boxes.text: The Last Word Hand Cannon is a gun from the videogame Destiny. This was a project that my older brother and I decided to work on together after being big fans of the game. One of my hobbies, 3D printing helped with the build of this gun. I build this one that is in the picture while my brother built his favorite one, the Sunshot.

boxes.title: Hunter's Dice Box
boxes.text: This epoxy dice box was someting that I made for one of my brother's birthday. It was the first project that I made with epoxy when I was facinated my epoxy art and projects. It is a DND dice box that can hold all of his dice and a few other little things he wishes to add.

boxes.title: Epoxy Cutting Board
boxes.text: This was an epoxy cutting board that I made for one of my brothers birthday gift. I was really into working with epoxy and wood because I have always appreciated other people's work in the art, so I decided I wanted to try my hand at it. It was one of the first projects I did with the epoxy, so there was a lot to learn.
